List of mirrors to download the notmm source
distribution. 

To add a public server to this list, please
contact me at animelovin@gmail.com or erob@gthcfoundation.org.

Canada
======

- http://gthc.org/dist/notmm/ (Master site)

United States
=============

- http://pypi.python.org/pypi/notmm/
- http://bitbucket.org/erob/notmm/
